content: bustleton tee bustleton is a template for making your own unique fingering weight top a simple tee with a circular yoke this is the perfect little summer sweater to throw on with jeans or a skirt shown here with wide stripes you can choose the width of stripes and the colors that make you happy or you can knit it up in one color or add a stitch pattern to the yoke and/or the body the easy top-down construction allows for customizing the fit in both body length and sleeve length skill level intermediate yarn fingering weight yarn 704 780 860 950 1045 sizes 1150 1265 1390 yds a b c
